mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, KJFW, GJC, GZMS, JYZJ, FJJX, FJZCH, JD, ZJH, ZY, BJH, ZT, ZDDWID, ZDRID, ZDSJ
mapper.select: select BS015.ID, BS015.DPRTCODE, BS015.KJFW, BS015.GJC, BS015.GZMS, BS015.JYZJ, BS015.FJJX, BS015.FJZCH, BS015.JD, BS015.ZJH, BS015.ZY, BS015.BJH, BS015.ZT, BS015.ZDDWID, BS015.ZDRID,BS015.ZDSJ, D005.ZJH AS FZJH,D005.ZWMS AS FZWMS,D005.YWMS AS FYWMS, BS01501.ID AS DID,BS01501.MAINID AS DMAINID,BS01501.PGJG AS DPGJG,BS01501.CLRID AS DCLRID,BS01501.CLR AS DCLR,BS01501.CLSJ AS DCLSJ from B_S_015 BS015 left join D_005 D005 on BS015.ZJH = D005.ZJH and BS015.DPRTCODE = D005.DPRTCODE left join B_S_01501 BS01501 on BS015.ID = BS01501.MAINID and BS01501.ZT = 1 where BS015.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into B_S_015 (ID, DPRTCODE, KJFW, GJC, GZMS, JYZJ, FJJX, FJZCH, JD, ZJH, ZY, BJH, ZT, ZDDWID, ZDRID, ZDSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kjfw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update B_S_015
KJFW = #{kjfw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GJC = #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GZMS = #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JYZJ = #{jyzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JD = #{jd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZDDWID = #{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDSJ = current_timestamp,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_S_015
set KJFW = #{kjfw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GJC = #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GZMS = #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYZJ = #{jyzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JD = #{jd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZDDWID = #{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDSJ = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.id != null and paramsMap.id != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.keyword != null and paramsMap.keyword != ''

sql.if:
and ( BS015.GJC like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or (BS015.BJH) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or (BS015.FJJX) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or (BS015.FJZCH) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%')
or (BS015.ZJH) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or (BS015.GZMS) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or (BS015.JYZJ) like ('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') )
